records.name: La Luna Boutique Dhangethi

descriptions.hotel: La Luna Boutique located in Ari atoll Dhangethi, the property is a 5-10 minute walk to harbor, bikini beach and public beaches. • ideal for families and groups • Beautiful garden and natural light This air-conditioned property comes with a dining area, a kitchen with a microwave, and a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. There are more than 20 islands in the Atoll designated for tourist resorts. Each island resort is self-contained with accommodation and recreational facilities such as tennis court. Scuba diving is the most popular tourist activity in the Maldives. The diving in Ari Atoll is extensive and is often defined by location within the atoll, either North or South.
descriptions.direction: • 1 hour 30 minutes speedboat ride from airport. • Speedboat ferries every day at 11.00Am and 4.00PM from airport. • To book speedboat please contact the hotel.
descriptions.general: Experience an abundance of unparalleled facilities and features at La Luna Boutique. Maintain seamless communication using the complimentary Wi-Fi at hotel.Car hire offerings at the hotel enhance the ease of discovering Maldive Islands.For extended visits or whenever required, the laundry service ensures your preferred travel garments remain fresh and accessible.During leisurely days and evenings, on-site amenities such as daily housekeeping enable you to fully enjoy your accommodation.For visitors wishing to smoke, designated smoking zones can be found.At La Luna Boutique, every guestroom is provided with convenient amenities and fittings to ensure a comfortable stay. Elevate your experience at hotel with the knowledge that certain rooms are equipped with air conditioning, ensuring a more pleasant stay for you. Begin your day carefree at La Luna Boutique, as complimentary breakfast is offered for your convenience.Enjoy an entertaining evening with your fellow travelers at the hotel's bar.During your stay at hotel, an array of engaging activities and amenities guarantees a delightful experience.During your stay, don't forget to allocate some moments to experience the readily available shoreline.Discover the fitness amenities at hotel to maintain your health and strength during your getaway.
descriptions.other: Location is ADH. The diving in Ari Atoll is extensive and is often defined by location within the atoll, e
